column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Dishes were overpriced and generally unmemorable.  The goat cheese in tomato sauce that everyone raves about?  Well
column2: if you've ever had warm goat cheese on a pizza
column3: it's exactly like that (except without the crust
column4: and for quadruple the price per volume).  Pitchers of sangria were at least 60% ice by volume.  One star for the bread and olive oil
column6: give us enough for the whole table.  They finally got the memo on that after the third time we asked.
